    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains(float x,
                        float y)
        Specified by:
        contains in interface Shape
        Parameters:
        x - x Coordinate that defines the point, that is checked for containment in the shape.
        y - y Coordinate that defines the point, that is checked for containment in the shape.
        Returns:
        True, if the given point defined by x and y is contained in the shape.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Vec2f point)
        Specified by:
        contains in interface Shape
        Parameters:
        point - Point, that is checked for containment in the shape.
        Returns:
        True, if the given point defined by a Vec2f is contained in the shape.

      • getArea

        public float getArea()
        Specified by:
        getArea in interface Shape
        Returns:
        Calculates the area of the shape and returns it. The area is in unit that was used to define the points and geometry of the shape.

      • getCircumference

        public float getCircumference()
        Specified by:
        getCircumference in interface Shape
        Returns:
        Calculates the perimeter of the shape and returns it. The perimeter is in the unit that was used to define the points and geometry of the shape.
